General.Name: Gold Rain Enterprises
General.Description: Gold Rain Enterprises Corp. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of vending machines in Taiwan, China, Japan, the United States, and the Southeast Asian countries. It provides beverage, food, and lifting vending machines; smart devices; and OEM and ODM products, including OEM GoStation and OEM IGT lottery machines, as well as sheet metal processing services. The company offers its products under the ALONA brand name. Gold Rain Enterprises Corp. was founded in 1969 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.
